alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Clay; Cleburne; Talladega (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 4:54PM CDT until July 01 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Talladega County in east central Alabama... Southern Calhoun County in east central Alabama... Southwestern Cleburne County in east central Alabama... Northeastern Clay County in east central Alabama... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 454 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Talladega Municipal Airport, or 9 miles southwest of West End-Cobb Town, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Anniston, Oxford, Cobb Town, West End-Cobb Town, Saks, Munford, Hobson City, Grant Town, Anniston Regional Airport, Oxford Lake, Bynum, Delta, Mount Cheaha, Anniston Army Depot, Eastaboga, Choccolocco, Dearmanville, Camp Mac, Chalafinnee and Jenifer. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
